name: vocal-lab-app
description: A simple server to host the VocalLab static web application.

scripts.build: tsc server.ts --module commonjs --target es2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --public-path=/dist/ --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.mov=file --loader:.mp4=file --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --define:process.env.API_KEY='"AIzaSyD0JEm3fqse7TQZ1ri2UWMmdtJigyX3fpo"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_BETA_BUILD='"'${VITE_BETA_BUILD:-false}'"'
scripts.build:prod: tsc server.ts --module commonjs --target es2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && mkdir -p dist_prod && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist_prod/bundle.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.mov=file --loader:.mp4=file --jsx=automatic --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --define:process.env.API_KEY='"AIzaSyD0JEm3fqse7TQZ1ri2UWMmdtJigyX3fpo"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_BETA_BUILD='"'${VITE_BETA_BUILD:-false}'"' && sed -e 's|dist/bundle\.js|./bundle.js?v='$(date +%s)'|g' -e '/<link rel="stylesheet" href="\/index\.css">/d' index.html > dist_prod/index.html && mkdir -p dist_prod/sounds && cp -r sounds/* dist_prod/sounds/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p dist_prod/visuals && cp -r visuals/* dist_prod/visuals/ 2>/dev/null || true
